description.paragraph1: Srenova is a property transaction where you sell your home while retaining the right to live there for life. You receive an initial payment (bouquet) and guaranteed monthly payments for life.
description.paragraph2: Srenova has modernised this centuries-old concept with institutional backing and digital efficiency to provide you with unparalleled financial security in retirement.

chat_prompt: Got Questions? Our Srenova Guide can help.

chat.initial_message: Hello! I'm here to help answer your questions about our viager programme. What would you like to know?

suggested_questions.age_requirements: What are the minimum age requirements?
suggested_questions.property_types: What types of properties are eligible?
suggested_questions.mortgage: What if I have an outstanding mortgage?
suggested_questions.process_timeline: How long does the process take?
